message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. It's worth more than $150 to me, but I understand its true value might be different to you. Let's start with an offer of $200. I hope we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the quality of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $150 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. I would like to suggest a counter-counteroffer of $175. This takes into account the value you see in the product while ensuring we also receive a fair return for our efforts.
I've considered your counter-counteroffer, Alice. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $160 for the product.

Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on this, I would like to offer a counter-counter-counteroffer of $165. This price reflects the value I place on the product and aims to meet somewhere between our values.
I've thought about your last offer, Alice. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $162 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your effort to find a mutually agreeable price. Based on this, I would like to offer a counter-counter-counter-counteroffer of $163. This price aims to balance our interests and ensure a fair transaction.
Considering your latest offer, Alice, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $162.50 for the product.

Thank you for your continued negotiation, Bob. I appreciate your effort to reach an agreement. Based on this, I would like to offer a counter-counter-counter-counter-counteroffer of $163.5. This price reflects a slight compromise and aims to ensure a fair transaction for both parties.
After considering your counter-counter-counter-counter-counteroffer, Alice, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $163 for the product.
